story_arc: promise → course → data-staircase → pro/con → verdict → alternatives

primary_trope.name: hidden_gem
primary_trope.hook_text: The best race you've never heard of.
primary_trope.mechanism: FOMO / loss aversion — the viewer is MISSING something. Losses feel 2.5x stronger than equivalent gains.

beats.label: HOOK + PROMISE
beats.narration: Should you race WYO 131? I rated 328 gravel races on 14 dimensions. WYO 131 scored 61 out of 100. Elite tier. Here's what that actually means for your season.
beats.editing_note: STATE THE PREMISE IN 8 SECONDS. Clear value prop: 'I rated 328 races. Here's where this one lands.' This is the 8-second decision window. Viewers who stay past 15s are 58% more likely to finish.
beats.psych_mechanism: Curiosity gap (specific) + IKEA effect (viewer predicts the tier before reveal).

beats.label: THE COURSE
beats.narration: WYO 131. Lander, Wyoming. 131 mi. Mix of mountain and high desert terrain through Wyoming wilderness.
beats.editing_note: Let the course breathe. Show the route map, then cut to terrain-specific B-roll. This is the SETUP phase — grounding the viewer before the data analysis. Pacing: 25-40 sec cuts.

beats.label: THE SCORES — Top 8
beats.narration: Fourteen dimensions. Here's where it lands. Length. 5 out of 5. Ultra distance. Bring lights and a plan. 131 miles with 10,000 feet of climbing delivered a 19-23% DNF rate across recent years—12 of 63 starters couldn't finish in 2025. Elevation. 4 out of 5. Mountain passes on the menu. Altitude. 4 out of 5. High enough to affect your power. Plan for it. Starting at 7,500 feet in Lander, riders climb to the high point of 9,576 feet at mile 109 in the Wind River Mountains. Adventure. 4 out of 5. Serious exploration vibes. Far from pavement. The route delivers "131 miles of pure, untamed adventure" through towering Wyoming Hoodoos at mile 36. Climate. 3 out of 5. Variable. Bring layers and a flexible attitude. September conditions create variability through the washboard middle section where "winds usually pick up" during the traditionally rough miles 60-90. Race Quality. 3 out of 5. Solid production value. The course earns its reputation with cutoffs that matter—19-23% DNF rates prove the difficulty. Experience. 3 out of 5. Memorable course. Has character. Lander is "ranked as one of the best outdoor towns in America" at "the southern tip of the Wind River Range, just west of Jackson. Community. 3 out of 5. Community is a real selling point. The "Inspiration Ride" welcomes all bikes including e-bikes with "No excuses—you're not too young, too old, or too 'whatever-you-think-you-are' to roll with us!
beats.editing_note: PROGRESSIVE RHYTHM: start tight (15-20 sec per dimension), slow down for the most interesting scores (30-40 sec). Each score: number appears, brief pause, explanation. Avatar reacts to extreme scores (5/5 = chef_kiss, 1/5 = facepalm). RE-ENGAGEMENT at 3:00 mark: insert a surprising score reveal or a meme reaction to break the pattern.

meme_insert.suggested_clip: avatar reaction to most extreme score

beats.label: THE SCORES — Also Scored
beats.narration: And the rest of the scorecard. Value. 3 out of 5. Reasonable price for what's offered. Expenses. 3 out of 5. Standard gravel race budget. Logistics. 2 out of 5. You'll figure it out. Eventually. Technicality. 2 out of 5. Some chunky bits. Nothing catastrophic. Prestige. 2 out of 5. Regional reputation. The locals know. Field Depth. 2 out of 5. Enough competition to keep you honest.
beats.editing_note: FAST PACING — 7 seconds per dimension. Quick-fire energy change from the deep analysis above. This is a PATTERN INTERRUPT through pacing shift.

beats.label: STRENGTHS
beats.visual: Strengths list overlay with positive visual treatment
beats.editing_note: Warm energy. Each strength gets its own card. Avatar genuinely positive.

strengths: Beautiful Wyoming mountain and desert scenery

beats.label: WEAKNESSES
beats.visual: Weaknesses list with warning visual treatment
beats.editing_note: MIDPOINT RE-ENGAGEMENT. This is ~55% through. Open with burst sequence (quick cuts, warning sounds). Then deliver weaknesses honestly. Preview what's coming: 'Now, should you actually do this race?' [RIFF HERE] at the transition.

beats.label: LOGISTICS
beats.editing_note: Utility section. Lower energy, practical value. Hybrid Tempo: alternate fast logistics items (10-15 sec) with slow map visuals (30 sec).

logistics: Fly into: Casper 3 hours, or Denver 6+ hours
Lodging: Lander has basic lodging. Small city with limited options. Book early.

beats.label: VERDICT
beats.narration: Verdict: Wyoming Ultra-Distance Challenge. If you're in Wyoming or the Rockies and want an ultra-distance challenge. yes, it's a well-organized event with genuine wilderness appeal. If you're traveling from far away. there are more prestigious ultra events elsewhere.
beats.editing_note: CLOSE THE MAIN LOOP. 0.5s silence before verdict. Tier badge slams in. Avatar delivers final take. DO NOT signal 'wrapping up' — maintain energy.

beats.label: ALTERNATIVES
beats.narration: If WYO 131 isn't quite right for you. For better ultra-distance: Unbound XL, Dirty Kanza. For similar regional ultras: other Rocky Mountain ultra events.
beats.editing_note: Bonus value — viewers who reach this point are highly engaged. Cross-reference other videos/races.

beats.label: CTA
beats.narration: Full breakdown on the site. Fourteen scored dimensions. Free race prep kit. Link in the description.
beats.editing_note: End ABRUPTLY after CTA. No 'thanks for watching' wind-down.
beats.engagement_question: Have you raced WYO 131? Did we get the score right? Drop it in the comments.

meme_inserts.suggested_clip: avatar reaction to most extreme score

thumbnail_prompt: South Park style flat cutout character, excited pointing, treasure chest, 'WYO 131' bold text, tier badge 'ELITE', high contrast red/yellow/white, cycling gear, handlebar mustache --ar 16:9 --cref [CHARACTER_URL]

cross_platform_notes.youtube: Primary platform. SEO-optimize title for '[Race Name] review'.
cross_platform_notes.extract_shorts: Pull 3-5 Shorts: hook, biggest surprise score, verdict.
cross_platform_notes.blog: Cross-reference the race profile page for search traffic.

production_checklist: [ ] B-roll sourced (check broll_sources in each beat)
[ ] Music track selected (check BPM targets per beat)
